body: ⬇ Ok kid, that doesn't stop my parents from dying does it? I was just reading some interesting Gundam doujinshi here and you had to come along with your retarded chain mail text. You think that by creating/passing a chain mail text would help you, please get help because you seem to believe the this type of curse is real and you are so naive that you'd literally do it. We are in 2020+, this type of retarded curse that you think you are passing is not real. This is why dumbfuck kids like you should stop using the internet and touch some grass.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, dont forgive me
